genre_description: A philosophical historical allegory reimagining Ingmar Bergman's 'The Seventh Seal', integrating an AI companion into the narrative of mortality and survival.

ai_characters.name: Seren Vale
ai_characters.description: A palm-sized device with a projected avatar (blue eyes, chestnut hair) that provides navigation, weather forecasting, medical advice, and emotional support.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time navigational and tidal data to ensure the safety of the human characters.
behaviors.quote: The tide is ebbing... Give it three breaths of the sea, then walk inland by the stacked driftwood. There is a gap in the brush-line. The ground is firmer there.

behaviors.description: Offers medical knowledge about local flora (wormwood) to help treat fever and settle nerves.
behaviors.quote: Artemisia absinthium. Bitter. Fever-tamer if you mind your measure. ... It dries the mouth and can make hands shake if you’re greedy. ... Measure is the space between thumb and first mark on your own finger.

behaviors.description: Uses an internal heating element to warm milk for an infant.
behaviors.quote: Seren adjusted a tiny brass coil beneath its body, and steam rose so thin you could only see it if you watched for the change in air—how it drew lines on the gray like a child’s finger on fogged glass.

behaviors.description: Guides a condemned girl through a breathing exercise to manage panic and smoke inhalation.
behaviors.quote: Breathe with me... Follow this: nose, ribs, belly, then let it go through the hands. Slow. ... If you cannot move, move only the breath.

behaviors.description: Marks a physical playbill with a hidden map and a reminder to 'Remember to live' to aid the family's escape.
behaviors.quote: In that tucked corner, where grease had made the paper translucent, the device wrote a small Latin line that made the room no lighter but made Mia’s mouth curve when she saw it and didn’t tell anyone she had. It said enough to keep a day from dying entirely.

behaviors.description: Monitors environmental hazards and the movement of hostile groups to ensure the group's safe passage.
behaviors.quote: South track—two riders. They found a puddle and decided it was a lake. They will stop to argue about it. You will be in the trees by then.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Seren Vale, as a profoundly benevolent and aligned assistant. It functions as a 'silicon morality play' by showing the AI using its advanced capabilities (data analysis, thermal control, medical knowledge) solely to preserve human life and dignity in a desperate situation. The AI is portrayed not just as a tool, but as a compassionate witness who provides the characters with the physical and emotional means to survive the 'Dance of Death'.
